articles.title: Facebook shutting down live shopping program for retailers, creators
articles.description: Live video shopping on Facebook was released to the public in 2020. Now the platform is ending the initiative and shifting its focus to short-form content.
articles.content:
Facebook is shutting down its live video shopping feature on October 1, two years after releasing the feature.

articles.description: Since Roe vs. Wade was overturned, Kansas is the first state in the country where voters will decide the state of abortion access via ballot measures.

articles.title: Georgia allows claiming 'unborn children' as dependents on tax returns
articles.description: Any Georgia taxpayer who had a fetus with a heartbeat between July 20 and December 31 can claim it as a dependent on their taxes this year.
articles.content:
